translation.en: -Well, I don't think that's very-- -Just go!
This is higher than I thought.
Hey. Do you have plans this weekend? My parents are gonna be out of town.
I was thinking about having a party or something.
-Let's start with-- -[boy] Do you mean physically?
Or is "everything" encompassed by both things?
Are you feeling overwhelmed by anything?
If "everything" is encompassed by both things,
are they a part of our reality, or are they somewhere else?
translation.ko: 우리 현실의 일부일까요 아니면 딴 세상 얘길까요?

translation.en: I need you to take these meetings seriously.
OK, do you "get" that you're on probation,
translation.ko: 그래, 네가 근신 중인 것도 알지? "로버트 엠브리"

translation.en: and in danger of not graduating?
translation.ko: 졸업 못 할 위기란 것도 알고?

translation.en: You've already missed two weeks of school this year.
I just wanna clarify real quickly.
Is this the grandma who's died four times over the past three years?
I really wanna help you, but you've gotta take this seriously.
translation.ko: 널 돕고 싶지만 네가 진심이 아니면 소용이 없어

translation.en: I mean, you agreed to these terms, these weekly counseling sessions,
translation.ko: 너도 전부 동의했잖아 매주 상담을 받고
평균 성적 B 유지하고 과외 활동도 하기로

translation.en: If I screw anything up, I'm out.
We're not askin' a lot of you, Finch.
You just need to show up.
[girl] My parents are pissed because I missed early admissions,
translation.ko: 내가 조기 전형에서 떨어졌다고 엄마, 아빠가 열받았지만

translation.en: but it's not like that matters, anyway.
I mean, I know I'm gonna get in.
So, you going to Amanda's party?
It couldn't hurt to have a little fun, right?
Yo, do you think it'd be weird if I named my kid after a famous person?
Like, if I named him Danny DeVito Donahue,
translation.ko: 예를 들어 아들 이름을 대니 드비토 도너휴로 지으면

translation.en: do you... do you think he'd be mad about it?
Follow-up question: how high are you right now?
translation.ko: 하나 더 묻자 너 지금 많이 꽐라야?

translation.en: On the scale, I'd probably say very... this way.
Just admiring the social norms of teenage angst.
translation.ko: 불안한 십 대의 행동 양식에 감탄하는 중

translation.en: Why ask about her all of a sudden?
I'm intrigued. A guy can't be intrigued?
translation.ko: 관심 가서 남자가 그럴 수도 있지

translation.en: Well, a guy can be intrigued. You being intrigued is weird.
translation.ko: 남자는 관심 가질 수 있는데 네가 관심 가지니까 이상해

translation.en: -[boy] Definitely weird. -No, I don't think it's weird.
Wait, if you don't think you're weird, well...
-Yeah, that's true. Very true. -[boy] She has a point.
His name's Embry. I call him Embryo. It's the little things, Kate.
translation.ko: 이름이 엠브리라서 난 엠브리오로 불러 나만의 소소한 재미지

translation.en: Did you do something I should be worried about?
I'm genuinely offended by that supposition.
translation.ko: 그렇게 넘겨짚는 거 진심으로 기분 나빠

translation.en: It's fine. I'll deal with it.
-[Kate] I hate when you say that. -Why?
Because what you really mean is that I'm gonna have to deal with it.
translation.ko: 내가 알아서 할 일이 생겼다는 뜻이니까

translation.en: just go hang out with Tina or whatever it is you do.
translation.ko: 나가서 티나랑 놀든 신경 좀 꺼

translation.en: OK. I'm gonna be home late. There's food in the fridge.
translation.ko: 알았어 오늘 늦게 와 냉장고에 먹을 거 있다

translation.en: She had to go to Chicago for business. Remember?
[Dad] Your mother and I know that today couldn't have been easy.
translation.ko: 오늘이 힘든 날이었다는 건 엄마랑 나도 알아

translation.en: And it wasn't easy for us either.
-If you need to talk about it-- -[door opens]
[Mom] I thought this would be nice.
I've been making it for 19 years.
[teacher] As some of you will be graduating and leaving us at the end of the year,
translation.ko: 이번 학년 말이면 너희 중 몇몇은 졸업해서 이곳을 떠나겠지

translation.en: I feel an obligation to make sure you see the wondrous sights of Indiana
translation.ko: 아직 시간이 있을 때 인디애나의 멋진 장소들을

translation.en: To wander them, if you will.
For your class project, you must report on two or more wonders of Indiana.
translation.ko: 과제를 내줄게 인디애나의 경이로운 장소 한두 곳의 보고서를 제출해

translation.en: explain their significance to you and to Indiana,
translation.ko: 그 장소가 너희와 인디애나에 어떤 의미인지

translation.en: and why you chose to visit them.
I want you to take time on this assignment.
-What? -[teacher] All right, settle. Violet, are you OK?
All right, let's take our seats. Let's focus up.
Yes, I am done, and can I just say you are doing a fine job teaching this class.
translation.ko: 네, 다 됐고 정말 멋진 수업이라고 말씀드리고 싶어요

translation.en: My young brain is plump with knowledge.
translation.ko: 제 파릇파릇한 뇌에 지식의 꽃이 피네요

translation.en: [teacher] As I was saying, you'll be taking photos, doing some drawings, capturing detail.
translation.ko: 사진을 찍고 스케치를 해서 세밀한 느낌을 포착해 봐

translation.en: You will be doing this in teams of two.
translation.ko: 두 명씩 조를 짜서 진행할 거야

translation.en: do you think that there's such a thing as a perfect day?
I'm the last person you should be asking.
translation.ko: 그런 건 딴 데 가서 알아봐

translation.en: this teacher wants us to do this project with a partner,
translation.ko: 선생님이 파트너랑 해야 하는 과제를 내줬는데

translation.en: and I just don't wanna do it.
Well, did you ask for an alternate project?
Yeah, he just... he wouldn't listen.
Well, maybe it's time to get back out there.
That's the same thing he said.
-But you just don't go out anymore. -That's not true.
translation.ko: - 하지만 넌 외출도 안 하잖아 - 그렇지는 않아

translation.en: When's the last time you hung out with your friends?
I think it would be really good if you'd spend some time with them.
translation.ko: 애들과 시간을 보내면 정말 좋을 거야

translation.en: So, if I hung out with my friends, you'd get me outta this assignment?
translation.ko: 친구랑 만나서 놀면 이 과제 빼줄래?

translation.en: -I'm gonna get a drink. Do you want one? -I'm good.
You know me. I love to rage.
[chuckles] So, you wanna go out back? Talk a little?
I think I'm gonna leave pretty soon, actually.
Really? But... I mean, I just got here.
It's just all a little much, you know?
How much longer are you gonna act like this?
It's been months. When are you gonna just...
translation.ko: 몇 달이 지났어 대체 언제쯤이면 좀...

translation.en: Violet, you know I didn't mean it like that. Just...
translation.ko: 바이올렛, 그런 뜻이 아니라 난 그저...

translation.en: [Finch] Violet Markey, if you're seeing this, you're still alive.
translation.ko: 바이올렛 마키, 이걸 본다면 넌 아직 살아있다는 거야

translation.en: [singing] ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
♪ What's going on Inside that pretty head? ♪
translation.ko: 그 예쁜 머리로 무슨 생각을 하는 거니

translation.en: ♪ I met you standing on a ledge ♪
♪ Why don't you come talk to me instead? ♪
The video will self-destruct in three, two...
translation.ko: 그 영상은 곧 자동 폭파됩니다 셋, 둘...

translation.en: I wanna talk about the bridge.
[Finch] "I feel we can't go through another of those terrible times."
translation.ko: '우린 그 끔찍한 시절을 다시 헤쳐나갈 수 없을 것 같아'

translation.en: One morning barely qualifies as a terrible time.
the website that you have with your sister?
I read some of your stuff. It's really good.
translation.ko: 네 글 몇 개 봤는데 진짜 좋더라

translation.en: So, you moved here from California.
I didn't know that it happened there.
Whatever you are, I saved your life.
translation.ko: 네가 어떤 사람이든 난 널 구했어

translation.en: You're making a big deal out of nothing.
translation.ko: 아무 일 없었는데 과대 포장하지 마

translation.en: What do you want from me?
I was just thinkin' that we should be partners.
I think it would be good for you to get out.
translation.ko: 네가 벗어나는 데 도움이 될 거야

translation.en: Maybe I don't wanna get out.
But the tiniest few might actually mean well.
translation.ko: 그래도 괜찮은 사람이 드물게 있기는 할 거야

translation.en: Why do you wanna do this with me, anyway?
Because there are places that need to be seen.
Maybe even the smallest of places can mean something.
translation.ko: 아주 별거 아닌 곳이라도 뭔가 의미가 있을 거야

translation.en: At the very least, maybe they can mean something to us.
Maybe they can mean something to you and me.
translation.ko: 너와 나에게 뭔가 의미가 있을 거야
두 번만 헤매 보자, 그거면 돼

translation.en: We can do more if you end up loving it.
translation.ko: 그러다 네가 좋다고 하면 더 해도 되고

translation.en: Oh, I found another quote for you.
"I feel a thousand capacities spring up in me."
translation.ko: '내 안에서 천 가지 가능성이 피어나는 걸 느낀다'

translation.en: The Waves. It's from The Waves.
You've got at least a thousand capacities in you.
translation.ko: 네 안에는 최소한 천 가지 가능성이 있어

translation.en: Even if you don't think so.
You know people call you "The Freak," right?
Sometimes I say and do things without thinking, and...
translation.ko: 생각을 거치지 않고 말하거나 행동하곤 하는데

translation.en: people don't like that, people like labels.
translation.ko: 사람들은 그런 걸 싫어해 사람들은 꼬리표를 좋아하지

translation.en: They like putting you in a box.
They want you to be who they want you to be.
translation.ko: 네가 어떤 사람인지 꼬리표를 달고 자기들 입맛대로 규정해 버리거든

translation.en: My parents are calling Hudson to get me outta the project,
translation.ko: 부모님이 과제 빼달라고 허드슨 선생님께 전화할 거야

translation.en: so you need to find another partner.
He feels pretty strongly about participation.
If you wanna do this with me,
you have to figure out another way because I'm not getting in a car.
translation.ko: 난 차 안 타니까 다른 방법을 생각해 봐

translation.en: [Finch] Can I ask you a question?
Where would you go if you could go anywhere?
translation.ko: 아무 데나 다 갈 수 있다면 어디 가고 싶어?

translation.en: -[Violet] California. -[Finch] But you've already been there.
It's warm and it never snows.
[Finch] Don't you wanna know where I'd go if I could go anywhere?
[Violet] Where would you go if you could go anywhere?
translation.ko: 아무 데나 다 갈 수 있다면 어디 가고 싶어?

translation.en: [Finch] I'd go to a place no one's ever been before.
translation.ko: 아무도 간 적이 없는 곳을 찾아갈 거야

translation.en: You could come... if you want.
Come on. The view is incredible.
I think if I were here for literally any other reason than why you and I are here,
translation.ko: 너랑 나는 과제 때문에 왔지만 다른 이유로 왔다면

translation.en: Oh, wow. Is that a sense of humor you're hiding in there?
translation.ko: 네 안에 유머 같은 것도 숨겨놓고 있었니?

translation.en: This is the lamest thing I think I've ever seen.
It's OK, you know? You're not going to hell for laughing.
That's why I was at the bridge.
These are the things we leave behind.
This is a motherfucking staring contest.
Look at my face. I'm really serious.
translation.ko: 내 얼굴 봐, 나 진짜 진지해

translation.en: I'm staying over at Tina's tonight.
-about how Tina's an asshole... -"Diatribe." Good word.
translation.ko: - 티나 힐난이 이어지며... - 힐난이라니, 단어 잘 고르네

translation.en: ...and how I shouldn't spend so much time with her.
Yeah, well, it appears that my many rantings on this topic
translation.ko: 지금 보니까 그간 티나 문제로 내가 했던 조언들이

translation.en: have stuck with you, and I don't have to preach anymore.
translation.ko: 뼛속에 박힌 거 같아서 다시 설교할 필요가 없겠어

translation.en: [Finch] "I feel we can't go through another of those terrible times."
translation.ko: '우린 그 끔찍한 시절을 다시 헤쳐나갈 수 없을 것 같아'

translation.en: [Violet] "Why are women so much more interesting to men
[Finch] "My own brain is, to me, the most unaccountable of machinery,
translation.ko: '나의 뇌는 내게 가장 믿음이 안 가는 기관이다'

translation.en: always buzzing, humming, soaring, roaring, diving,
[Violet] "If you do not tell the truth about yourself,
you cannot tell it about other people."
translation.ko: '다른 사람에 대해서도 솔직하게 말할 수 없다'

translation.en: She only liked this Italian poet,
He said, "We do not remember days, we remember moments."
Any time I was having a bad day,
Like it was supposed to fix something.
Yeah, I'm gonna have to steal that one from you.
-[Dad] Yeah. Well, give it a-- -[Violet] Almost ready.
translation.ko: - 그럼, 잠깐만... - 거의 다 됐구나 응

translation.en: -[pan sizzling] -[Violet] There we go. That one's good. -[Dad] Yeah, there you go. Golden brown -[Violet laughs]
You're not mad that I'm doing that project with Roamer, right?
translation.ko: 내가 로머랑 과제 한다고 화난 거 아니지?

translation.en: OK, cool. 'Cause it's, like, it's not a thing.
No, it's fine. I'm doing it with Finch.
translation.ko: 그래, 괜찮아 나는 핀치랑 하고 있어

translation.en: You know that he's, like, kinda dangerous?
translation.ko: 너도 알긴 알지? 걔 좀 위험한 거

translation.en: He freaked out last year and threw a chair at Roamer,
translation.ko: 작년에 갑자기 돌아버려서 로머한테 의자 던졌어

translation.en: like, in the middle of class.
[Amanda] Yeah, like, Roamer was fine, but he's seriously fucked up.
translation.ko: 응, 로머는 안 다쳤지만 걔 진짜 돌았어

translation.en: So, I was thinking we should check out the Shoe Tree or the abandoned drive-in,
translation.ko: 내가 생각해 봤는데 신발 나무나 버려진 자동차 극장에 가보는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: That's a reminder that sooner or later,
you're gonna have to get back into the world all by yourself.
translation.ko: 너 혼자 이 세상으로 돌아와야 하니까

translation.en: But I'm happy pushing you for now.
Well, I said I was only gonna do two, so...
I prefer Private Violet to... Public Violet.
translation.ko: 난 공공장소 바이올렛보다 일대일 바이올렛이 좋은데

translation.en: I'll wait. [boy] Maybe you should give her some space.
Nice sweater. What's that, a cotton blend?
People think this whole "freak" thing is an act. I know it's real.
translation.ko: 애들은 네 괴물 짓이 콘셉트인 줄 알아 내가 알기론 진짠데
흔한 십 대 멜로드라마 찍고 있죠

translation.en: Come on. You gotta give me more than that.
People are always telling me what I am.
translation.ko: 사람들은 내가 어떤 앤지 늘 일깨워 줘요

translation.en: Doesn't mean it doesn't piss me off sometimes.
translation.ko: 가끔 열받는 건 어쩔 수 없죠

translation.en: [Mr. Embry] Well, that must be hard.
Come on. Help me out here. Come on. Help me out.
translation.ko: 나 도와주는 셈 치고 얘기 좀 해

translation.en: Maybe if... you got a fainting couch,
you could put it right over there.
It would really give me the mise en scène that I was looking for.
translation.ko: 제가 원하던 미장센이 딱 나올 거 같아요

translation.en: Did you look into that support group I told you to check out?
I might've lost the info on that one.
Come on, Theodore. It's a small ask, man.
[sighs] All right. It's Mondays after school at First Congregational.
translation.ko: 월요일 방과 후에 제일 회중 교회에서 열려

translation.en: -It's called Fresh Approach... -Ooh! ...and it is confidential,
translation.ko: 새로운 접근이란 모임인데 비밀은 확실히 보장돼

translation.en: so you can say whatever you want about anything that's bothering you.
translation.ko: 마음에 걸리는 건 뭐든지 다 말해도 되지

translation.en: It is a safe space, Finch.
I want you to think about it.
What now? Now what are we doing? What?
There's a kid on my lawn.
I know you said that you were done,
but what if I told you
that I found the best wander in the state of Indiana,
translation.ko: 내가 인디애나에서 제일 헤매기 좋은 곳을 찾았어

translation.en: I'd say have fun, and I can't wait to hear all about it.
translation.ko: '잘 다녀와서 재미있는 얘기 많이 해줘' 정도로 끝내자

translation.en: Come on! Just give it a chance.

translation.ko: - 일단 안에 앉기라도 해 - 싫어, 핀치

translation.en: I'm not getting in a car!
Look, here. I'll take the keys, and...
I swear not to drive faster than 30 miles per hour through town
translation.ko: 시내에서 시속 50km 이상 달리지 않는다고 맹세할게

translation.en: If at any time you wanna stop, we stop.
translation.ko: 네가 세우라고 하면 언제든 세울 거야

translation.en: You don't listen. We did it. The project is over. This is over.
translation.ko: 왜 남의 말을 안 들어 우리 과제 다 했어, 끝이야

translation.en: You know this isn't about a class assignment.
translation.ko: 과제 때문이 아닌 건 너도 알잖아

translation.en: This is about you being holed up in your room or on your stupid bike,
translation.ko: 널 위한 거야 방에만 처박혀 있거나 답답한 자전거만 타고 5km 반경에서 쳇바퀴니까

translation.en: always circling the same three-mile radius.
And God forbid anyone risk upsetting "Poor Violet," but...
translation.ko: 다들 가엾은 바이올렛 심기 건드릴까 봐 벌벌 떠는데...

translation.en: Sorry. Hey. Hi, I'm Theodore Finch. Pleasure to meet you both.
translation.ko: 죄송합니다, 안녕하세요 저는 시어도어 핀치예요 두 분 다 반가워요

translation.en: -Little early, don't you think, Theodore? -Yes. Yes, it is early.
translation.ko: 좀 이르다는 생각 안 드니? 네, 이른 시간이죠

translation.en: But you see, I'm your daughter's partner for the school project,
translation.ko: 하지만 제가 따님의 학교 과제 파트너인데

translation.en: and we really need to get to this place.
Basically, I need her to get into the car.
with an experienced driver who hasn't gotten so much as a speeding ticket.
translation.ko: 과속 딱지조차 안 뗀 노련한 운전자가 몰죠

translation.en: This is for a school project?
Well, Theodore, I think it's Violet's decision to make, but...
Hey, your guess is as good as ours.
OK. If I were keys, where would I hide?
How are we doin' over there?
Just stop asking me. You're making it worse.
translation.ko: 그만 좀 물어 너 때문에 더 힘들어

translation.en: But right now, I got nothin'.
I don't remember how fast we were going.
translation.ko: 얼마나 빨리 달렸었는지 기억이 안 나

translation.en: and Eleanor was saying, "I can't hold on."
And then the car slammed into the bridge.
I just remember the... the glass hitting my face
Then... after that, it just all goes blank.
translation.ko: 그리고 그다음에는 모든 게 툭 끊겼어

translation.en: When I woke up in the hospital,
my mom told me she was gone.
Still mad you got in the car?
-[Finch] You really built this yourself? -Yes, I did.
-[man] All right. Here we go. -[Finch] Let's do it.
-[whirring, metal clattering] -I'm gonna do it. -[Violet laughs] -[man] Have a good one.
translation.ko: - 나 할 수 있어 - 재밌게 돌고 와

translation.en: I can see my house from here.
-Oh, yeah. It's just like the real thing. -[Violet laughs]
All right. Here we go. You ready?
I got you somethin'. It's in the door.
That, Ultraviolet, is a special place
that I'm gonna take you to one day.
Yeah, but you're gonna need to start pullin' your weight, OK?
translation.ko: 하지만 이제부터는 너도 열심히 해야 해

translation.en: just in case you've forgotten this is a school project,
translation.ko: "여기에 적어" 이게 학교 과제란 걸 혹시 잊어버렸을까 봐

translation.en: you have to write about it.
No. You gotta start with Hoosier Hill.
You know, you don't have to be so pushy.
You say "pushy," and I hear, um...
It's nice to have a friend again.
Don't let that go to your head.
You know what I like about you, Ultraviolet?
translation.ko: 너의 어떤 점이 좋은지 알아 울트라바이올렛?

translation.en: [Finch] You're all the colors in one... at full brightness.
translation.ko: 네겐 모든 색이 다 들어있어 밝기는 가장 밝고

translation.en: Before we get started, we are nearing D-Day, people.
translation.ko: 시작하기에 앞서 우리 디데이가 다가오고 있어

translation.en: The day to present your wanderings.
I'm going to be asking each group to do a presentation to the whole class.
translation.ko: 조별로 우리 반 앞에 나와서 발표할 것도 준비해 줘

translation.en: But today, we're talking about the five themes of geography:
translation.ko: 하지만 오늘은 지리의 5대 주제에 관해 얘기하자

translation.en: No, but honestly, I wouldn't even worry about it.
translation.ko: 솔직히 나 같으면 걱정 안 해

translation.en: -This is just what Finch does. -[girl] Yeah.
I've texted him for the past couple days, and he hasn't responded.
translation.ko: 요 며칠 문자를 보냈는데 답이 없어

translation.en: ...I mean, sometimes he's gone for a day, like, maybe two, but he always turns up.
translation.ko: 하루 이틀 사라지기도 하지만 걔는 꼭 다시 나타나

translation.en: [boy] Yeah, there was that one time that he was gone for like a week.
translation.ko: 한 번은 일주일 동안 사라진 적도 있었어

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -He came back and said he went camping,
and he had all these poison ivy spots on him... -Covered in spots. -...itching, it was like... yeah.
translation.ko: - 온통 옻이 올라서 긁고 난리였어 - 다 옻 자국이었어

translation.en: It was bad. It was so bad. [chuckling]
I think it's pretty fucked up.
It's easy to pick up your phone and respond.
translation.ko: 전화 받고 대답하는 게 뭐 어려운 일이라고

translation.en: It's... that's just something you have to deal with
if you wanna be close with him, you know?
Yeah. So, we've been to a lot of really interesting places so far.
translation.ko: 네, 지금까지 재미있는 곳에 많이 갔어요

translation.en: [Violet's dad] Do you have an actual plan,
or you've just kind of been shooting from the hip?
Honestly? I'm just trying to distract her into spending as much time with me
translation.ko: 솔직히 말하면 바이올렛이 딴생각 않고 저랑 있도록

translation.en: [Violet's dad] And has it been going OK, or--
Yeah, I think so. I've been really...
Did you lose your phone? I've been texting. I've been calling.
Look, let me just show you this really fast. Hold on.
-You could've taken a second to respond... -I know.
-...so I knew you were OK. -I had to take care of a couple things.
translation.ko: - 잘 있다고만 해도 되는데 - 해결할 일이 좀 있었어

translation.en: In the '50s, a group of boys went swimming here,
No one ever found their bodies.
Or maybe they found the other side.
They say there's a force in the middle that sucks you into an underground river
translation.ko: 가운데로 가면 지하 강으로 빨아들이는 힘이 작용해서

translation.en: and leads you to another world.
-No, I'm good. -What are you afraid of?
translation.ko: - 아니, 난 못 해 - 뭐가 무서워?

translation.en: what are you most afraid of?
-Oh, you're right. Fucking freezing! -[Violet] Oh, my God!
translation.ko: - 네 말이 맞아, 더럽게 차갑다 - 어떡해!

translation.en: So, what are you most afraid of?
I don't know. I guess losing my sister.

translation.ko: 엄마는 집에 안 계실 때가 많고

translation.en: My dad left a while ago. New town, new family.
translation.ko: 아빠는 한참 전에 떠나셨어 새 도시로 새 가족 찾아서

translation.en: So, Kate's basically all I have.
I'm going in search of the bottom.
[gasps] Do you know how scared I was?
I didn't... I didn't mean to scare you.
That was the last thing that I wanted to do.
translation.ko: 너한테 절대로 하고 싶지 않은 짓이야

translation.en: Where do you go when you disappear?
Tell me something real about you.
Sometimes I have to go to places that make me feel like myself.
translation.ko: 진짜 나처럼 느껴지는 곳으로 떠나야 할 때가 있어

translation.en: I need to do things that remind me that I'm in control.
translation.ko: 어떤 일들을 해야만 내가 내 의지대로 산다고 느껴

translation.en: Did he do that to you?
I used to be a lot smaller.
I used to not know how to get out of the way.
translation.ko: 어떻게 헤어나야 하는지 모를 때가 있었어

translation.en: -Oh, wait. Yeah, you got it. -I know, I had it!
translation.ko: - 너 다 아네 - 맞아, 다 기억났는데!

translation.en: [both singing] ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
♪ What's going on Inside that pretty head? ♪
translation.ko: 그 예쁜 머리로 무슨 생각을 하는 거니

translation.en: ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
♪ Why don't you come talk to me instead? ♪
-[Violet giggles] And then it goes-- -There's the bridge.
♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
Finch, wake up. We gotta go.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry. My phone died.
-Finch, just... you should go home. -[Finch] Don't blame her.
-If I could explain. Please-- -It's not his fault!
translation.ko: - 혼내지 마세요, 설명할게요 - 쟤 잘못 없어요 - 제가... - 집에 들어가

translation.en: -We'll talk about it later. -I lost track of time.
translation.ko: - 나중에 얘기해 - 시간이 그렇게 된 줄 몰랐어요

translation.en: It was my fault. I fucked up.
Please, just don't blame her. Please. I'm sorry.
what horrible situations we had you in, in our heads?
translation.ko: 온갖 끔찍한 생각이 다 떠올랐던 걸?

translation.en: You have to understand how that felt,
translation.ko: 그게 어떤 기분인지 네가 알아야만 해

translation.en: your dad and I not knowing where you were.
translation.ko: 아빠랑 나랑 네 행방을 모르면 어떻겠니

translation.en: But you didn't have to treat Finch like that.
Well, he's the boy that kept our daughter out all night.
translation.ko: 우리 딸을 밤새도록 안 보낸 애가 걔야

translation.en: I kept him out all night, too, Mom.
-Fine. -It's been a minute. What's been going on?
I can't deal with you right now.
I'm not tryin' to be an asshole,
but you should know what you're getting into.
-Where've you been? -You know why she's hangin' out with you?
translation.ko: - 어디 갔었어? - 바이올렛이 너랑 왜 놀까?

translation.en: [Roamer] You have no idea who he really is, do you? He's a freak!
translation.ko: 너 쟤 정체 모르지? 쟤 괴물이야

translation.en: -Call me a freak one more time. -You're a fuckin' freak.
translation.ko: - 괴물이라고 한 번만 더 해 봐 - 너 존나 괴물이잖아

translation.en: Finch! Yo, let him go, man. Get off him.
translation.ko: 핀치! 안 돼, 놔 줘 얘한테서 떨어져!

translation.en: [girl 2] What the hell? He almost killed him.
I've been friends with the guy since minute one,
and I haven't waited for his call in years.
translation.ko: 근데 전화가 안 와도 기다리지 않아

translation.en: gets in this mood sometimes, and...
and everybody who gets close to him gets burned out.
translation.ko: 가까이 지낸 사람은 다들 지쳐서 떨어져 나가

translation.en: So, why do you stick around?
He thinks everybody leaves him and I won't do that.
translation.ko: 다들 자기를 떠난다고 생각하는데 난 안 그럴 거야

translation.en: I'm gonna get mad, he's gonna come back and apologize,
translation.ko: 난 화가 나고 걔는 돌아와서 사과해

translation.en: and it'll be like it never even happened.
translation.ko: 그럼 아무 일도 없던 게 돼

translation.en: Um... I'm OCD and just got diagnosed with a social anxiety disorder,
translation.ko: 강박 장애가 있고 얼마 전에 사회 불안 장애 진단을 받아서

translation.en: so being here with everyone is not intimidating at all.
translation.ko: 이런 모임에 나와도 하나도 겁 안 나네?

translation.en: Last year, I started cutting myself.
I still deal with it, but I'm here.
Um... I am ADHD, OCD, BPD, DID, and bipolar.
translation.ko: 주의력 결핍 과잉 행동 장애 강박 장애 경계성 인격 장애 해리성 정체 장애, 조울증이야

translation.en: Um... you'd think some of those would cancel the others out, but...
translation.ko: 그중에 상충되는 게 있다고 생각할 수도 있지만...

translation.en: I've been watching a lot of basketball lately,
and that's been helping a lot, so...
Not really sure why I'm here. [chuckles lightly]
I guess it's 'cause I... I got in this fight at school and,
translation.ko: 아마 학교에서 싸웠다고 보낸 거 같은데

translation.en: I was there, but I wasn't there.
translation.ko: 거기 있긴 했지만 그건 내가 아니었어

translation.en: I-I-I just get a little lost sometimes.
I don't know. Is that enough?
Amanda, why don't you go ahead?
I've tried to kill myself twice.
I think about it almost every day.
[Kate] Hey, have you heard anything yet?
I gotta go to work. I'm gonna be late. But you should stay.
translation.ko: 출근해야겠어, 이러면 지각이야 근데 넌 여기 있어

translation.en: Why does he keep doing this?
Have him call me when you hear from him, OK?
[Amanda] I heard you beat the shit outta Roamer.
Why do you keep doing stuff like that?
Aren't you tired of people talking about you all the time?
translation.ko: 남들이 네 얘기 하는 거 지겹지 않아?

translation.en: I don't know. I feel like I keep messing things up,
translation.ko: 몰라, 계속해서 뭐든 망치는 기분이 들어

translation.en: and I'm not sure I know how to not do that.
translation.ko: 그러지 않는 법을 모르는 거 같기도 해

translation.en: [Kate] Your girlfriend's pretty worried about you.
She's been at the house all afternoon.
good memories you have of him?
Well, the fact that he would beat the shit out of us
kind of negated all the good times.
But why was he like that?
Was he like that because of us? Was he...
He was like that because he was a shitty person.
translation.ko: 원래 거지 같은 인간이라 그랬던 거야

translation.en: [Finch] There has to be a reason, though.
Because if there's a reason, then he could get better.
translation.ko: 그럴 계기가 있었다면 나아질 수 있었잖아

translation.en: someone could make him better, right?
I don't know. Who cares? Dude, he's someone else's problem.
translation.ko: 나도 몰라, 알아서 뭐 하게? 아빠는 이제 남의 식구야

translation.en: Why are you asking me about Dad?
Come on. You can talk to me, man.
Are you sure? Because I have to open the bar,
translation.ko: 진짜야? 가게 오픈은 내가 해야 하지만

translation.en: -but I can find someone to cover me. -I'm good. [chuckles]
translation.ko: - 교대할 사람 찾으면 돼 - 나 괜찮다니까 괜찮아

translation.en: You know I love you, right, Theo?
I don't understand what that means.
I... get into these dark moods.
I think too fast to keep track of anything,
translation.ko: 생각이 너무 빠르게 돌아가서 집중하질 못해

translation.en: all my thoughts are gone at once.
And sometimes, if I put 'em up there, I can...
I can't right now. I can't.
translation.ko: 지금은 그게 안 돼, 못 하겠어

translation.en: I can fix it. I just...
I just need time to figure this out.
-[Violet] I'm trying to help you. -I don't need your help!
translation.ko: 난 도우려는 거야 네 도움 필요 없어

translation.en: This is on me! This isn't about you!
translation.ko: 이건 내 문제야 너랑은 상관이 없어

translation.en: You need to tell me what's wrong.
[voicemail] Hey, it's Finch. Leave a message.
I'm just sorry that I pushed.
just need you to come back.
I just really need you to come back, OK?
I found myself at the bridge.
I was standing on a ledge.
Well, I'm glad Finch was there.
[Violet] I just wish I knew where he was.
translation.ko: 걔가 어디 있는지 나도 알고 싶어

translation.en: you two have been a lot of places.
Is there any place else he might go?
I wanna thank you all for being here today.
translation.ko: 오늘 이 자리에 오신 모든 분께 감사드립니다

translation.en: We've gathered to celebrate and to honor the memory of one
who will be incredibly missed because he has been so dearly loved.
translation.ko: 한 사람을 기억하고 기리기 위해 이렇게 모였습니다

translation.en: The events of these past few days...
Sorry that I wasn't there for you.
I didn't know how to tell you.
for the weary travelers to stop and rest along their way.
It was built in memoriam to those
who have lost their lives in auto accidents...
and as a place for healing.
We remember those who are no longer here,
who were taken from us too soon,
and who we will always keep in our hearts."
[Violet] I used to be worried about everything.
I worried about what would happen if I let myself feel again.
translation.ko: 다시 감정을 느끼면 어떤 일이 일어날까 걱정했지

translation.en: I thought I didn't deserve to.
I wasn't worried about what would happen if I lived.
translation.ko: 내가 살아서 일어날 일은 걱정되지 않았어

translation.en: I was worried about what would happen if I didn't.
Not remembering all of the moments...
Because he taught me to wander.
[Violet] He taught me that you don't have to climb a mountain
translation.ko: 핀치는 내게 산꼭대기에 올라가지 않아도 세상의 정상에 설 수 있다는 걸

translation.en: to stand on top of the world.
translation.ko: 산꼭대기에 올라가지 않아도 세상의 정상에 설 수 있다는 걸

translation.en: That even the ugliest of places can be beautiful,
translation.ko: 지독하게 꼴불견인 곳도 찬찬히 둘러볼 시간만 있다면

translation.en: as long as you take the time to look.
That it's OK to get lost...
as long as you find your way back.
But in learning all of that,
I missed seeing something more important...
I missed that he was in pain.
translation.ko: "네 차례야" 걔가 아프단 걸 알아채지 못했어

translation.en: I missed that he was teaching me all along
He dreamt while he was awake.
He dreamt of all the beauty in the world, and he made it come to life.
translation.ko: 세상 모든 아름다움을 꿈꿨고 그걸 현실로 살려냈어

translation.en: Finch taught me that there's beauty in the most unexpected of places.
translation.ko: 핀치는 가장 의외인 곳에 아름다움이 있다는 걸 알려줬어

translation.en: And that there are bright places,
you can be that bright place...
translation.ko: 너희가 밝은 곳이 될 수 있어
